data.actual_result: Nothing happens. You have to tap hold the maximise button on a different app before you can choose the Discord app
data.expected_result: After holding the maximise button, you should get the option to put the app on the left or right side of the screen
data.short_description: Can't enable Split View by holding down the maximise button [macOS only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Click and hold on the green maximise button on the top left - Observe
